alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:24AM CST until January 31 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River at Edinburg. * WHEN...From this evening to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 20.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 19.3 Sun 8 am CST 20.5 20.3 19.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CST.
